item.title: Synology: Your NAS RAM Details at a Glance
item.description:
• Synology: Your NAS RAM Details at a Glance

step1

Control Panel / Task Scheduler / Create / Scheduled Task / User-defined script

step2

  1. General: In the Task field type in RAM Details. Uncheck the “Enabled” option. Select root User.
  2. Schedule: Select Run on the following date then select “Do not repeat”.
  3. Task Settings: Check “Send run details by email”, add your email then copy paste the code below in the Run command area. After that, click OK.

item.title: CentOS 7 掛載 Synology NAS 資料夾
item.description: • CentOS 7 掛載 Synology NAS 資料夾
